pkgmetadata.longdescription: # th2 common library (Python)`th2-common-py` is an API for all th2 components created with Python.Check the [Wiki](https://github.com/th2-net/th2-common-py/wiki) for instructions and examples.## Installation```pip install th2-common```This package can be found on [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/th2-common/ "th2 common library").
